_header: Sweet Jesu that on the Rood
Subjects: prayers, to Christ; Christ, prayers to
_description: A prayer to Christ — nine lines

BosPLMed124.Transcription:
Swete Ihesu þat on þe RodeBouȝtest vs wiȝ
                    þyne blodeLyfe wiþouten endyngeGraunte oure Lyf clene for to
                    ledeAnd þe Ihesu Louie and dredeOuer alle þyngeLord at
                    oure Lyues endeGraunte oure soule for to wendeIn to aungeles
                    Woniynge
